text: We're No Angels is a 1955 American crime comedy movie directed by Michael Curtiz and was based on the 1952 French play La Cuisine Des Angels by Albert Husson. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Aldo Ray, Peter Ustinov, Joan Bennett, Leo G. Carroll, Basil Rathbone, Gloria Talbott and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was remade in 1989. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:1955 crime movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: We're No Angels (1955 movie)
